rows.label: tlk45200153_10_msg0001
rows.name:
H-hey! You look like you can handle
yourselves in a fight! C-could you
maybe help me out with something?

rows.label: tlk45200153_10_msg0002
rows.name:
I-it's the back alleys... They're
haunted by a gh...a gh...

rows.label: tlk45200153_10_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh come on, do I have to say
it?! It's a gh-gh-gh-ghost!

rows.label: tlk45200153_10_msg0004
rows.name:
I was hiding in the back alley during
a game of hide-and-seek, and I heard
this voice like a woman crying!

rows.label: tlk45200153_10_msg0005
rows.name:
It's not just me, either! My
younger sister saw this shadow
like a woman with long black hair!

rows.label: tlk45200153_10_msg0007
rows.name:
What, really? You'll help?!
It might be a real
gh-gh-gh-ghost, you know?

rows.label: tlk45200153_10_msg0008
rows.name:
All right... I'll leave it to
you, then! Just make sure you
don't get p-possessed or anything!
